string.name: name
string.value: Certified Tank
The urban legend "White Lady" is real and I met her...\n\nShe told me of how she was murdered. She keeps saying, if my #requipment had more HP#k, I would have survived the attack myself.
I promised the "White Lady" I would have protected her and proved it to her with my gear.\n\nShe gave me a very rare #rmedal#k and told me not to lose it...

string.name: name
string.value: Forge the Black Key

I spoke with Eleska who aspires to be a great forgemaster some day. She came here in search of resources her current forgemaster asked her to find. She said if I can gather the appropriate resources, she will #rforge the key#k as practice...

A win-win I guess, I get the key, she get's to show her forgemaster her improvement...

She mentioned that I can get leather from #rBoars#k and the flaming feather comes from #rFire Boars#k!
I provided the resources to Eleska and she showed me what forgemasters are capable of by forging the #rBlack Key#k...
Eleska thinks she can forge the #rBlack Key#k...

string.name: name
string.value: Help A Brother Out
Byron needs help with his brother...

Speaking with Byron, he's a bit pushy and his brother is a bit weak. They seem perfect for each other. Good to have a balance, ya know?

Byron said that one of the #rnearby monsters#k ran off with his brothers water while they were sleeping. Now, he's acting like he's about to die...

He said if I got his brothers water, they would trade a #rmap#k they were given by another vault hunter...
After returning Christopher's water, I was given a map to the #bHidden Oasis#k!

string.name: name
string.value: Winston's Hat Collection

Speaking with Winston, apparently there's only one thing he loves more than fossils, #rhats#k. He couldn't wait to show me his hat.\n\nHe's too old now to hunt and find all the #rbamboo hats#k in the region, so he asked me to do so for him.
I collected one of each bamboo hat and gifted them to Winston. In return, he gave us one of the prized #rfashionista# cards, #2!
Winston wants to share his love of...hats(?)...with you...

string.name: name
string.value: Solve the Riddles
Adonis want's to talk about accessing the vault...

Adonis said, in order to access the vault, I need to solve all three #rstatues#k. Each statue would give me a piece to the vault key.\n\nHe mentioned the #rmap#k I received from the #bbrothers#k and the #rclue#k I received from #bZara#k to get started.
I solved all three riddles and collected all three pieces of the #rBlack Vault Key#k...

string.name: demandSummary
string.value: Collect the #rBlack Vault Key#k!\n\n #i3997002:# #t3997002:# #c3997002:# / 1

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Access to #bThe Vault#k!

string.name: name
string.value: Meet The Collector
I should find #bThe Collector#k. I think he goes by "Grubby". The townspeople say he may be able to help me out. He said he was somewhere in #bKora City#k.
I found #bThe Collector#k!\n\nHe gave me this ring and told me to collect "things" for him. He says my ring can grow in power and not to lose it...

string.name: name
string.value: Warp Token: Kora Garden
I found a #rWarp Token#k!\n\nApparently #bOmnar#k likes to eat(?) these?
I brought the #rWarp Token#k to #bOmnar#k. He gobbled it up and opened up the #bKora Garden#k fast travel point for me!

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: #bKora Garden#k Fast Warp
I found a #rWarp Token#k!\n\nApparently #bOmnar#k likes to eat(?) these?
I brought the #rWarp Token#k to #bOmnar#k. He gobbled it up and opened up the #bKerning City#k fast travel point for me!

string.name: name
string.value: Warp Token: Kerning City

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: #bKerning City#k Fast Warp
I found a #rWarp Token#k!\n\nApparently #bOmnar#k likes to eat(?) these?
I brought the #rWarp Token#k to #bOmnar#k. He gobbled it up and opened up the #bStoneweaver Village#k fast travel point for me!

string.name: name
string.value: Warp Token: Stoneweaver Village

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: #bStoneweave Village#k Fast Warp

string.name: name
string.value: Popular People Only
#bShumi#k said her agent told her not to mingle with people who aren't popular...
I got a little bit more famous and #bShumi#k referred me to her stylist...
#bShumi#k says I'm not popular enough...

string.name: name
string.value: Free Makeover
#bDon Giovanni#k will give me a free makeover...
I should head over to the #bKerning Barbershop#k and get my makeover...
Well, I don't know what to say. I read the fine print (I think) and I got what I asked for, I guess...

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 4

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
You can solve Rain's Quizzes if you carefully think about it.
Rain's 4th Quiz was finding the hot-key for picking up the items on the ground. That's easy~ it's " Z" of course~ But I found out I can also pick up items with the number key "0"...
Let's solve #b#p12101##k's fourth Quiz.

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 5

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
What would be the 5th Quiz?
Rain gave me a Quiz about Job Advancements. For Warriors, Thieves, and Bowmen, you need to be at least level 10, while for Magicians, you can advance at Level 8.
#b#p12101##k's fifth Quiz. What would it be about?

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 6

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Finally, it's the 6th Quiz. I'm happy that my Maple knowledge can be used here like this. Why don't I go for the 6th Quiz?
I learned that every time my level goes up, I get 5 Ability Points(AP) that I can upgrade my abilities. I can see the detail with the hot-key "S".
Shall we solve #b#p12101##k's sixth Quiz?

string.name: name
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz 7

string.name: parent
string.value: Rain's Maple Quiz
Finally the last Quiz. Now I think I'm not a beginner~
Rain advised me to leave Maple Island and go for a greater journey. In Victoria Island, you can choose your job, and face a whole lot of new adventures. Ok...let's go to Maple Island's South Ferry...
This is #b#p12101##k's last Maple Quiz! I'm excited. Let's do it!

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training
Mai in Maple Island seems like a Martial -Art specialist, who can train the beginners to boost up the strength...

I decided to get trained under the Famous Sword-Master, Mai, in Amherst. I guess hunting the weakest monsters is a good idea. Should I hunt Snail, Blue Snail, and Shroom in order?

#o100100# #r#a10161# #k
#o100101# #r#a10162# #k
#o120100# #r#a10163##k

 Ah, Mai told me to meet with #p20002# in Southperry and try training together...
Mai trained me, and I feel I'm a lot stronger.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Final Training

string.name: parent
string.value: Mai's Training
Mai's training is a simple monster-hunt. But it is very useful in getting used to hunting. Let's get Mai's training, which might be the last training in Maple Island.
Mai told me to hunt stronger monsters. Of course it is important to know your own strength, but to develop your strength, you need to try to hunt stronger monsters.\n\n#o1210102# #r#a10171# #k
After getting Mai's traning, I became much stronger. I think I am going to leave Maple Island to get a job I like. Let's go to South Ferry and head to Victoria Island.

string.name: name
string.value: Todd's How-to-Hunt
I hear Todd can teach us how to hunt...

Todd taught me to move towards upper right-hand side to attack and kill #bJr. Sentinel#k, and talk to #p2002#...

Jr. Sentinel #b#a10181##k
#t4000142# #b#c4000142#/1#k
I killed the monster just as Todd told me.

string.name: name
string.value: Getting Started
Sam would like help with something. He said to take out #r30 Snails#k...
When I talked to Sam, he said to take out #r30 Snails#k...\n\n#b#o100100# #r#a10191##k
As Sam told me, I hunted #r30#k #o100100##k...

string.name: name
string.value: Pio and the Recycling
I gathered up the recycling materials that Pio asked for, and he said he'll make me something nice in return...
Pio promised to make me a nice relaxing chair with the recylicing materials I gathered up for him.
I helped Pio gather up the recycling materials, and he made a nice comfortable chair.

string.name: name
string.value: Roger's Apple
Let's talk to #b#p2000##k.
By pressing the hotkey I, I can consume #b#t02010007##k in consumption window. Let's talk to #b#p2000##k..
I learned how to use items! This will make life much easier!

string.name: name
string.value: Lucas' Cute Daughter
They say there's a request for elder #b#p12000##k in #b#m1010000##k.

#p12000# is worried about his daughter in #b#m60000##k. To make the way safe for his daughter on her way home, he asked me to catch #r#o0130101##k. #o0130101#? Hmmm~ tough one..Then after killing #o0130101#, shall I go to #b#p20100##k? \n #k \n#o0130101# #r#a10221# #k
I let #p20100# know I beat off all of #o0130101#. Yes!

string.name: name
string.value: Here little Piggy...
#b#p20002##k in #b#m60000##k looks upset. What's going on?

#p20002# heard that somebody told him he looks like #o1210100#. That's why he's so mad. To be honest, they look alike.....anyway, for #p20002#, let's get #r2#o1210100##k. \n #k \n#o1210100# #r#a10231# #k
I defeated #o1210100#! #p20002# seems satisfied.

string.name: name
string.value: Love Counseling ?!
#b#p2005##k said he needs to ask me something...I hope this isn't some weird favor...

#p2005# is helping #b#p20001##k, the crew of #b#m60000##k, to find ingredients for his girlfriend's present. He asked me to get #b3 #t4000003##k and hand in to #p20001#. #t4000003#? It's a monster which looks like a tree stump. If I find #r#o0130100##k, I think I can get what he says. \n\n#i4000003##t4000003# #b#c4000003##k/3
I gave #p20001# #t4000003#. #p20001# is going to make a boat. When would he finish it? Would #p20100# be on #p20001#'s boat?

string.name: name
string.value: Maria's Nutritious Juice

string.name: parent
string.value: Maria and Shanks
#b#p2103##k said he wants to say something to me...

#p2103# wants to make a #bnutritious juice#k that is necessary for good health and asked me to get ingredients: #b#t4000004##k and #b#t4000011##k... I wonder what kind of juice it be.

#i4000004##t4000004# #b#c4000004##k/1 
#i4000011##t4000011# #b#c4000011##k/5
I have all ingredients to #p2103#. #p2103# seems to ask for some more.

string.name: name
string.value: Delivering Nutritious Juice to Shanks

string.name: parent
string.value: Maria and Shanks
Would #b#p2103##k make a nutritious juice? Seems to ask for more...
#p2103# asked me to give nutritious juice to #b#p22000##k, the captain of #b#m60000##k. Hmm...are they dating?
I gave #p22000# #p2103#'s nutritious juice. #p22000# looked happy... #p2103# and #p22000# are dating. The juice looks...pretty nasty, actually; but #p22000# was encouraged and gave me some advice.

string.name: name
string.value: Mai's Request

string.name: parent
string.value: For a new world
#b#p12100##k stands at #b#m50000##k. They say she is the strongest in Maple Island.... Why is she here? What's her life story like? Let's see #p12100#.

#p12100# is a new adventurer and worker on Victoria Island. But the elder, #p12000# in #m1010000# hired her in case of any dangerous situations on Maple Island. #p12100# says it's a hard time now because of all the work....Let's tell #b#p12000##k what #p12100# said.

#p12000# agreed with what #p12100# said. He said it's better to hire more workers. Then he asked me to tell #b#p1002101##k in #b#m104000000##k... #m104000000# is in Victoria Island...I have to go to #b#p22000##k in #b#m60000##k.

string.name: name
string.value: To Lith Harbor!

string.name: parent
string.value: For a new world

To deliver a message of #p12000# to #p1002101#, I need to go to Victoria Island. The only way I can get there is to pay #p22000# in #m60000#... Fortunately, #p12000# said he will ask #p22000# a favor. Let's not worry and go to #b#p22000##k.
#p22000# let me on board for free as he heard from #p12000#. Good, now let's go to Victoria Island! #m104000000#! Now I only have to find #b#p1002101##k? much bigger than Maple Island..can I find it?

I met #p1002101# in #m104000000#. Hmmm~ This tough and stubborn guy is a friend of #p12000#! Amazing! Fortunately, #p1002101# would do a favor of #p12000#. Hope I can find a nice guy so that my first trip to the Maple World ends well...

string.name: name
string.value: Sam's Advice
A kind guy on Maple Island, #bSam#k wanted to give me some Beginner advice...who says beginners aren't lucky?

Sam taught me #bHow to use AP#k which I can get whenever my level gets up. The investment of AP determines my power (STR), intelligence (INT), agility (DEX), luck (LUK). My investment choice of AP will increase my HP and MP. \n\nwhoa.. Fantastic! I learned a lot thanks to him. Sam said there is one more thing to tell me.

Sam told me to go to Victoria Island if I want to be a stronger adventurer through a Job Advancement. I can choose from a Warrior, a Magician, a Bowman, a Thief and a Pirate on Victoria Island. Each job has a stat requirement to join and train on that path: #bWarrior is STR 35, Magician INT 20, Bowman DEX 25, Thief DEX 25#k. I'll remember that and invest AP in the proper stats of the job i want!

string.name: name
string.value: Getting Started
#bSam#k at #rGreen Snails#k wants to help me get started, I should go find him...
Sam asked me to take care of some snails, they been mukkin up the place. I better slay #r30 snails#k and let Sam know.
I told Sam I took care of the snails.

string.name: name
string.value: Retrieve the Townspeoples Equipment
Gary wants to clear his brothers name...

At the entrance to #rThe Garden#k I ran into a familiar snail, Gary. He says his brother is misunderstood and wants to right the ship by returning the townspeople their equipment. He thought he saw a #rred#k, #rbrown#k, and #rgreen#k monster run off with them...
I collected the equipment and returned it to Gary. In return he gave me a silk headband. It's not much, but it feels nice...\n\nHe also noted that #rHeena#k might know more about his brother...

string.name: summary
string.value: Return these items to Gary.

string.name: name
string.value: Save Jake
Find a way into the #bKerning Subway#k and make sure Jake is okay.

I found #rJake#k in the subway, he got away without a scratch. However, he's stuck now. He said he had a #rscrewdriver#k in his tool bag...but it fell out when he was running. He thought he saw one of the colored slimes bounce over it and absorb it.

If we could find his #rscrewdriver#k, he said he could battle his way out and start helping with the repairs.

In return he offered me a #rring#k he found...apparently he finds all kinds of jewelry down here.
I found Jake's screwdriver and he was able to escape. He promptly checked in on Bell and started repairs with the Roly-Poly workers.

string.name: name
string.value: Estelle and the Lost Kite
Estelle is trying to find Icarus' kite...she looks a little scared...

I ran into Estelle on the outskirts of town. She let me know that her and Icarus got split up when they got scared. She wants to go home but not without Icarus's #rkite#k. She said a "dead" tree came to life and ran off with it!!! She's too scared to show me, but she said it was somewhere by the other #bdead trees#k over there. She asked me to find the #rkite#k and clear out some "dead" trees while I do so. I should get her and the kite back home...
I ran into #rEstelle#k on the outskirts of Kerning. She asked me to help find #rIcarus's#k kite and return it to him. I found it among the "dead" trees...

string.name: parent
string.value: Estelle and the Lost Kite

string.name: name
string.value: Dr. Squint's Great Idea
I heard there is someone in Naora Hospital in Kerning City that recently got some work done...

I met #b#p1012001##k in Naora Hospital in Kerning City. #b#p1052105##k was told by #rDr. Squint#k that the discovery of the new colored monsters could be revolutionary in healing her surgery. #b#p1012001##k asked me to hunt down 30 of each #rslime drop#k and 35 of each #rligator skin#k so he could test...on Jane?!??!\n\nHe also requested 5 #rOrchid Samples#k to help mitigate pain...
I gathered all of the materials I could and gave them to Dr. Squint... Hopefully he puts them to good use. \n\nSeems like #rJane#k wants to give me something. I should talk with her.

string.name: parent
string.value: A New Healing Serum

string.name: name
string.value: Jane is Thankful

string.name: parent
string.value: A New Healing Serum
Jane turned out to be a ghost... shocker... I guess the Doc really can't see much. I should accept the #rFashionista#k card from her...
When the Doc went to apply the healing serum, there was no body to apply to. He was just hearing Jane. She was thankful I tried and gave me her limited edition #rFashionista #1#k trading card!

string.name: name
string.value: Starting Something Special
The legendary trainer #b#p9201106##k wants to train me. I should take this opportunity. Let's see what he has to say!

#p9201106# is suggesting to hunt some monsters. He told me to defeat #r50 #o1110100#s#k. #o1110100# can be found in the #bDense Forest#k. I should head to #bZone 2#k to look for them.\n\n#o1110100# #r#a21281##k
I defeated #r50 #o1110100#s#k and reported to #p9201106#..simple eh?

string.name: name
string.value: The Beauty Queen
The Beauty Queen wants my cards!

An odd, super enthusiastic, woman named Ari reached out. She was calling herself #rThe Beauty Queen#k and yelling at me about #rFashionista#k cards.\n\nI guess she really wants all five of these in return for a free makeover? I could use a new look...
I collected all five #rFashionista#k cards, found #rThe Beauty Queen#k and traded my cards for her #rBeauty Coupon#k...Unlimited makeovers is nice...

string.name: summary
string.value: Collect all five cards, solve the riddle, find #rThe Beauty Queen#k!

string.name: name
string.value: I Lost My Balloons!
Bri lost all her balloons and she's giving big rewards to those that find them...

I talked with #rBri#k, she seems really nice.

Unfortunately all her balloons were blown away in a big wind storm. She thinks they are scattered all over the world. If I find them all she has a really nice reward for me! After talking for a while, she said they could be hidden anywhere. Really, just about anywhere.

#e#rShe said to pay attention to my surroundings, listen to what people say, read their speech bubbles, etc...#k#n
I found all the balloons and Bri gave me a permanent pet vac!!!

string.name: summary
string.value: Find all 10 colored balloons scattered throughout the world and return them to Bri!

string.name: name
string.value: Where I Come From...
Alex wants to teach you a thing or two about being an Aran!
You eliminated the Blue Mushrooms and brought Alex a Frozen Tuna. He rewarded you with his basic knowledge of the Aran!
#rAlex#k said his father was a mighty warrior and before he ran away, he used to train with him. He wants to teach you as well...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Skill Unlock: #rCombo Ability#k\nSkill Unlock: #rPolearm Booster#k

string.name: name
string.value: Source of the Pollution

string.name: parent
string.value: Smog Over Kerning
#rJM#k is looking for someone to uncover the hidden truth about the smog, colored slimes and tunnel collapse.

I spoke with the mayor #rJM#k. He didn't trust me at first but since I've helped out so many of Kernings residents, he wants me to figure out what is happening to the city. He said there is no better person to start with other than #rNella#k.\n\n She didn't want to talk to me at first, but now that I have this investigation permit, maybe things will change.
I spoke with Nella and found out that Mong wasn't who he said he was...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1500

string.name: name
string.value: Wong?...from Dong??

string.name: parent
string.value: Smog Over Kerning
I should confront Wong about his identity...
I talked to Wong about his identity, it's all true and he told me he was being forced into by his boss... GOLD RICHIE!!?!?!!\n\nI need to tell JM, immediately.

JM could not believe that Gold Richie was in his city, that slimy two bit pirate. JM said we need to find him and put a stop to his operations. Wong never actually met Gold Richie in person. He only had a drop off location and that Gold Richie would #bbe somewhere nearby, because he is too lazy to walk far#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1500

string.name: name
string.value: Find Gold Richie
I told JM about #rGold Richie#k. We have to find him right away...\n\nWong from Dong said #rGold Richie#k should be holed up in #bthe building somewhere around the telephone booth at midtown#k.

I found and confronted Gold Richie.\n\n He was running a smelting operation for various gems and ores. The excess production was running off into the water line, which caused the new slimes to appear.

string.name: parent
string.value: Smog Over Kerning

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1500

string.name: name
string.value: The Cause of the Earthquakes
As I confronted Gold Richie, the building started to shake again... It felt just like Jake described. I should tell #rJM#k.

As I approached #rJM#k the ground started shaking again.

JM noted we need to find the cause before the city comes down around us.

He said, #rErvine#k noted some unusual issues with the water system in his last report. I should talk with him.

#rGold Richie#k was running an illegal ore and gem smelting operation. The runoff was leaking down into the water system. That was the cause of all the pollution and new slimes.

#rErvine#k said he ran into a #rHUGE Slime#k in the sewers. He gave me his #rkey#k and told me to tell JM right away.

 It's just me and the #rKing#k now.

string.name: parent
string.value: Smog Over Kerning

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1500

string.name: name
string.value: Down With the King
I need to tell JM about the large slime...
With no hesitation, JM put me in charge of taking down #rKing Slime#k and saving the city.
I defeated #rKing Slime#k, saved the city and cleared #rZone 2#k.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: #bHuckle Shop Update#k\n #bZone 3 Unlock#k #Wprob# #i1051017:# 개 #i1050018:# 개

string.name: summary
string.value: Enter the #bsewers#k, defeat #rKing Slime#k!

string.name: name
string.value: Find Jake!
#rBell#k made it out of the tunnel, but what about #rJake#k? Talk to #rBell#k...
I talked with #rBell#k and he is doing fine, little short for breath, but okay overall. He said Jake got trapped on the other side of the collapse. I have to find a way into the subway!
I was able to make the jump to the beam and found Jake in the subway...

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: EXP 1000

string.name: name
string.value: Heat Wave Preparation!
Zara's out gathering supplies for her mother and father. She said she found something important...

Speaking with Zara, she believes she found a #rclue#k to get into #bThe Vault#k of #bBlazing Peak Mountain#k.\n\nShe's willing to give it up in exchange for help collecting supplies for the annual heat wave.
I helped collect all the resources to help the Stoneweavers prepare for the heat wave. Young Zara was quite thankful, she reluctantly gave up that piece of paper she found.

string.name: name
string.value: Thorne gets cold at night...
Little Thorne looks cold, maybe I could help out...

Ayan asked that I collect #rbasic cloth#k so she can knit a new blanket for Thorne. I guess at night it gets quite cold on top of the mountain...\n\nAyan mentioned they drop from #rScorpion#k and #rBellamoa#k.
After I collected the cloth for Ayan, she quickly knit Thorne a soft blanket.\n\nAyan began to tell him an interesting #rstory#k, but he quickly fell asleep...

string.name: name
string.value: Picking Up the Trash
#rFrosty#k would like some help pickup up trash. It's getting pretty hot for him...

Frosty seems a little grumpy, I guess I would be too as a snowman in a big city. Especially cleaning up after people all day.\n\nFrosty asked that I pick up the trash from the #bBack Alley#k and bring it back to him. He said the entrance is by all the piled up trash next to the equipment shop.
I picked up the trash and brought it back to Frosty. He didn't seem very thankful...

string.name: name
string.value: Icarus' Smelly Shoes
#b#@1052106:##k in #b#m103000000##k has a simple favor to ask you.

He wants me to find his #rSmelly Gomushin#k that his mom threw away. He really liked those ones because unlike normal Gomushin, which made him feel fast, these ones made him feel like he could jump through the roof. It sounds like they are in the alley, (probably in one of the trash cans), waiting to be picked up with the rest of the trash. He said the entrance is by all the piled up trash next to the equipment shop.
As requested, you've returned the #rSmelly Gomushin#k back to him. Maybe you found an extra pair for yourself?

string.name: name
string.value: Ancient Coins
I found an #rAncient Coin#k(?) Rinne reached out to me and told me to come find her in #bKora City#k.\n\nShe said she's got goods to trade for them!
#rRinne#k taught me all about the new scroll system!\n\n#eShe also noted that I should be actively spending coins to progress!#n
Find an #rAncient Coin#k and bring it to #bRinne#k in #bKora City#k.
